channel.title: On-screen pk points! plz help!
channel.description: [glow=red,2,300]Need help on how to get on-screen pk points and server name plz spare some time and help[/glow]

item.title: On-screen pk points! plz help!
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

Thats what it should look like yes
Sorry, i just wipped that up quickly. I forgot my old one.

This is the only bit you need :

public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@red@Servernamehere", 6570);
sendFrame126("@gre@Pk points: " +pkpoints, 6572);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
setInterfaceWalkable(6568);
}

Read full topic

item.title: On-screen pk points! plz help!
item.dc:creator: @flamed_fury1 flamed fury1
item.description:
@flamed_fury1 wrote:

[code]import java.io.;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.text.;
import java.security.*;

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@red@Servernamehere", 6570);
sendFrame126("@gre@Pk points: " +pkpoints, 6572);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
setInterfaceWalkable(6568);
}[/code]
